alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 12:52AM CDT until April 26 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Henderson County in central Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1251 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Malakoff, or 7 miles west of Athens, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Malakoff, Caney City, Forest Grove Reservoir, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Log Cabin, Murchison, Star Harbor and Crescent Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
